Room.Name: Lyanden Road/Timarask Valley
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the King's Road, in the middle of Timarask Valley.
Room.LongDescription: A fierce wind drives a stinging rain from the east. This valley is in a perpetual rainstorm, and travelers are warned to hurry through this area, as giant birds of prey, known as stormhawkes, make their home in the driving rain.
